conclusion: Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - award;Respondent State to take measures of a general character
docname: CASE OF HOLY SYNOD OF THE BULGARIAN ORTHODOX CHURCH (METROPOLITAN INOKENTIY) AND OTHERS v. BULGARIA
